QuestData.Title: Dance for Ruumbo!
QuestData.Description: You have done well, $r! Ruumbo is pleased by your bravery, and the delicious honey you have given Ruumbo.$B$BNow, you must... you must dance! Yes!$B$BDance for Ruumbo! Dance!
QuestData.LogDescription: Do a silly dance for Ruumbo.
QuestData.RewardText: Those two brats... I should have known! They were smart enough to hush whenever I went to examine the totem.$B$BI'll be sure to find them and drag them back to Timbermaw Hold by the ears! Thank you for looking into it...
